creator: Myra P. Saefong
title: Oil prices jumped this week — and now U.S. consumers may be the ones to feel the pain from Trump’s Russia sanctions
dc:creator: Myra P. Saefong
content: The U.S.’s decision was surprising given Trump’s “longstanding focus on bringing down energy prices,” one analyst noted.
contentSnippet: The U.S.’s decision was surprising given Trump’s “longstanding focus on bringing down energy prices,” one analyst noted.

creator: Quentin Fottrell
title: Our two daughters are struggling with student debt. Should we dip into our $1.8 million 401(k)s to buy them apartments?
dc:creator: Quentin Fottrell
content: “Each apartment would be priced close to $225,000.”
contentSnippet: “Each apartment would be priced close to $225,000.”
